KalyttaBMP.h

00001 /*
00002  * Windows Bitmap File Loader
00003  * Version 1.2.2 (20100827)
00004  *
00005  * Supported Formats: 1, 4, 8, 16, 24, 32 Bit Images
00006  * Alpha Bitmaps are also supported.
00007  * Supported compression types: RLE 8, BITFIELDS
00008  *
00009  * Created by: Benjamin Kalytta, 2006 - 2010
00010  *
00011  * Licence: Free to use, URL to my source and my name is required in your source code.
00012  *
00013  * Source can be found at http://www.kalytta.com/bitmap.h
00014  */
00015 
00016 #include <cstring>
00017 
00018 #define BITMAP_SIGNATURE 'MB'
00019 
00020 typedef struct {
00021         unsigned short int Signature;
00022         unsigned int Size;
00023         unsigned int Reserved;
00024         unsigned int BitsOffset;
00025 } BITMAP_FILEHEADER;
00026 
00027 #define BITMAP_FILEHEADER_SIZE 14
00028 
00029 typedef struct {
00030         unsigned int HeaderSize;
00031         int Width;
00032         int Height;
00033         unsigned short int Planes;
00034         unsigned short int BitCount;
00035         unsigned int Compression;
00036         unsigned int SizeImage;
00037         int PelsPerMeterX;
00038         int PelsPerMeterY;
00039         unsigned int ClrUsed;
00040         unsigned int ClrImportant;
00041         unsigned int RedMask;
00042         unsigned int GreenMask;
00043         unsigned int BlueMask;
00044         unsigned int AlphaMask;
00045         unsigned int CsType;
00046         unsigned int Endpoints[9]; // see http://msdn2.microsoft.com/en-us/library/ms536569.aspx
00047         unsigned int GammaRed;
00048         unsigned int GammaGreen;
00049         unsigned int GammaBlue;
00050 } BITMAP_HEADER;
00051 
00052 typedef struct {
00053         unsigned char Red;
00054         unsigned char Green;
00055         unsigned char Blue;
00056         unsigned char Alpha;
00057 } RGBA;
00058 
00059 typedef struct {
00060         unsigned char Blue;
00061         unsigned char Green;
00062         unsigned char Red;
00063         unsigned char Alpha;
00064 } BGRA;
00065 
00066 class CBitmap {
00067 private:
00068         BITMAP_FILEHEADER m_BitmapFileHeader;
00069         BITMAP_HEADER m_BitmapHeader;
00070         RGBA *m_BitmapData;
00071         unsigned int m_BitmapSize;
00072         BGRA *m_ColorTable;
00073         unsigned int m_ColorTableSize;
00074 
00075         // Masks and bit counts shouldn't exceed 32 Bits
00076 
00077         class CColor {
00078 public:
00079                 static inline unsigned int BitCountByMask(unsigned int Mask) {
00080                         unsigned int BitCount = 0;
00081                         while (Mask) {
00082                                 Mask &= Mask - 1;
00083                                 BitCount++;
00084                         }
00085                         return BitCount;
00086                 }
00087 
00088                 static inline unsigned int BitPositionByMask(unsigned int Mask) {
00089                         return BitCountByMask((Mask & -Mask) - 1);
00090                 }
00091 
00092                 static inline unsigned int ComponentByMask(unsigned int Color, unsigned int Mask) {
00093                         unsigned int Component = Color & Mask;
00094                         return Component >> BitPositionByMask(Mask);
00095                 }
00096 
00097                 static inline unsigned int BitCountToMask(unsigned int BitCount) {
00098                         return (BitCount == 32) ? 0xFFFFFFFF : (1 << BitCount) - 1;
00099                 }
00100 
00101                 static unsigned int Convert(unsigned int Color, unsigned int FromBitCount, unsigned int ToBitCount) {
00102                         if (ToBitCount < FromBitCount) {
00103                                 Color >>= (FromBitCount - ToBitCount);
00104                         } else {
00105                                 Color <<= (ToBitCount - FromBitCount);
00106                                 if (Color > 0) {
00107                                         Color |= BitCountToMask(ToBitCount - FromBitCount);
00108                                 }
00109                         }
00110                         return Color;
00111                 }
00112         };
00113 
00114 public:
00115 
00116         CBitmap() : m_BitmapData(0), m_BitmapSize(0), m_ColorTableSize(0), m_ColorTable(0) {
00117                 Dispose();
00118         }
00119 
00120         CBitmap(char* Filename) : m_BitmapData(0), m_BitmapSize(0), m_ColorTableSize(0), m_ColorTable(0) {
00121                 Load(Filename);
00122         }
00123 
00124         ~CBitmap() {
00125                 Dispose();
00126         }
00127 
00128         void Dispose() {
00129                 if (m_BitmapData) delete[] m_BitmapData;
00130                 if (m_ColorTable) delete[] m_ColorTable;
00131                 m_ColorTableSize = 0;
00132                 m_BitmapData = 0;
00133                 m_ColorTable = 0;
00134                 memset(&m_BitmapFileHeader, 0, sizeof(m_BitmapFileHeader));
00135                 memset(&m_BitmapHeader, 0, sizeof(m_BitmapHeader));
00136         }
00137 
00138         /* Load specified Bitmap and stores it as RGBA in an internal buffer */
00139 
00140         bool Load(const char *Filename) {
00141                 FILE *file = fopen(Filename, "rb");
00142 
00143                 Dispose();
00144 
00145                 if (file == 0) return false;
00146 
00147                 fread(&m_BitmapFileHeader, BITMAP_FILEHEADER_SIZE, 1, file);
00148                 if (m_BitmapFileHeader.Signature != BITMAP_SIGNATURE) {
00149                         return false;
00150                 }
00151 
00152                 fread(&m_BitmapHeader, sizeof(BITMAP_HEADER), 1, file);
00153 
00154                 /* Load Color Table */
00155 
00156                 fseek(file, BITMAP_FILEHEADER_SIZE + m_BitmapHeader.HeaderSize, SEEK_SET);
00157 
00158                 if (m_BitmapHeader.BitCount == 1) {
00159                         m_ColorTableSize = 2;
00160                 } else if (m_BitmapHeader.BitCount == 4) {
00161                         m_ColorTableSize = 16;
00162                 } else if (m_BitmapHeader.BitCount == 8) {
00163                         m_ColorTableSize = 256;
00164                 }
00165 
00166                 m_ColorTable = new BGRA[m_ColorTableSize];
00167 
00168                 fread(m_ColorTable, sizeof(BGRA), m_ColorTableSize, file);
00169 
00170                 /* ... Color Table for 16 or 32 Bit Images are not supported yet */
00171 
00172                 m_BitmapSize = GetWidth() * GetHeight();
00173                 m_BitmapData = new RGBA[m_BitmapSize];
00174 
00175                 unsigned int LineWidth = ((GetWidth() * GetBitCount() / 8) + 3) & ~3;
00176                 unsigned char *Line = new unsigned char[LineWidth];
00177 
00178                 fseek(file, m_BitmapFileHeader.BitsOffset, SEEK_SET);
00179 
00180                 int Index = 0;
00181 
00182                 if (m_BitmapHeader.Compression == 0) {
00183                         for (int i = 0; i < GetHeight(); i++) {
00184                                 fread(Line, LineWidth, 1, file);
00185 
00186                                 unsigned char *LinePtr = Line;
00187 
00188                                 for (int j = 0; j < GetWidth(); j++) {
00189                                         if (m_BitmapHeader.BitCount == 1) {
00190                                                 unsigned int Color = *((unsigned char*) LinePtr);
00191                                                 for (int k = 0; k < 8; k++) {
00192                                                         m_BitmapData[Index].Red = m_ColorTable[Color & 0x80 ? 1 : 0].Red;
00193                                                         m_BitmapData[Index].Green = m_ColorTable[Color & 0x80 ? 1 : 0].Green;
00194                                                         m_BitmapData[Index].Blue = m_ColorTable[Color & 0x80 ? 1 : 0].Blue;
00195                                                         m_BitmapData[Index].Alpha = m_ColorTable[Color & 0x80 ? 1 : 0].Alpha;
00196                                                         Index++;
00197                                                         Color <<= 1;
00198                                                 }
00199                                                 LinePtr++;
00200                                                 j += 7;
00201                                         } else if (m_BitmapHeader.BitCount == 4) {
00202                                                 unsigned int Color = *((unsigned char*) LinePtr);
00203                                                 m_BitmapData[Index].Red = m_ColorTable[(Color >> 4) & 0x0f].Red;
00204                                                 m_BitmapData[Index].Green = m_ColorTable[(Color >> 4) & 0x0f].Green;
00205                                                 m_BitmapData[Index].Blue = m_ColorTable[(Color >> 4) & 0x0f].Blue;
00206                                                 m_BitmapData[Index].Alpha = m_ColorTable[(Color >> 4) & 0x0f].Alpha;
00207                                                 Index++;
00208                                                 m_BitmapData[Index].Red = m_ColorTable[Color & 0x0f].Red;
00209                                                 m_BitmapData[Index].Green = m_ColorTable[Color & 0x0f].Green;
00210                                                 m_BitmapData[Index].Blue = m_ColorTable[Color & 0x0f].Blue;
00211                                                 m_BitmapData[Index].Alpha = m_ColorTable[Color & 0x0f].Alpha;
00212                                                 Index++;
00213                                                 LinePtr++;
00214                                                 j++;
00215                                         } else if (m_BitmapHeader.BitCount == 8) {
00216                                                 unsigned int Color = *((unsigned char*) LinePtr);
00217                                                 m_BitmapData[Index].Red = m_ColorTable[Color].Red;
00218                                                 m_BitmapData[Index].Green = m_ColorTable[Color].Green;
00219                                                 m_BitmapData[Index].Blue = m_ColorTable[Color].Blue;
00220                                                 m_BitmapData[Index].Alpha = m_ColorTable[Color].Alpha;
00221                                                 Index++;
00222                                                 LinePtr++;
00223                                         } else if (m_BitmapHeader.BitCount == 16) {
00224                                                 unsigned int Color = *((unsigned short int*) LinePtr);
00225                                                 m_BitmapData[Index].Red = ((Color >> 10) & 0x1f) << 3;
00226                                                 m_BitmapData[Index].Green = ((Color >> 5) & 0x1f) << 3;
00227                                                 m_BitmapData[Index].Blue = (Color & 0x1f) << 3;
00228                                                 m_BitmapData[Index].Alpha = 255;
00229                                                 Index++;
00230                                                 LinePtr += 2;
00231                                         } else if (m_BitmapHeader.BitCount == 24) {
00232                                                 unsigned int Color = *((unsigned int*) LinePtr);
00233                                                 m_BitmapData[Index].Blue = Color & 0xff;
00234                                                 m_BitmapData[Index].Green = (Color >> 8) & 0xff;
00235                                                 m_BitmapData[Index].Red = (Color >> 16) & 0xff;
00236                                                 m_BitmapData[Index].Alpha = 255;
00237                                                 Index++;
00238                                                 LinePtr += 3;
00239                                         } else if (m_BitmapHeader.BitCount == 32) {
00240                                                 unsigned int Color = *((unsigned int*) LinePtr);
00241                                                 m_BitmapData[Index].Blue = Color & 0xff;
00242                                                 m_BitmapData[Index].Green = (Color >> 8) & 0xff;
00243                                                 m_BitmapData[Index].Red = (Color >> 16) & 0xff;
00244                                                 m_BitmapData[Index].Alpha = Color >> 24;
00245                                                 Index++;
00246                                                 LinePtr += 4;
00247                                         }
00248                                 }
00249                         }
00250                 } else if (m_BitmapHeader.Compression == 1) { // RLE 8
00251                         unsigned char Count = 0;
00252                         unsigned char ColorIndex = 0;
00253                         int x = 0, y = 0;
00254 
00255                         while (!feof(file)) {
00256                                 fread(&Count, 1, 1, file);
00257                                 fread(&ColorIndex, 1, 1, file);
00258 
00259                                 if (Count > 0) {
00260                                         Index = x + y * GetWidth();
00261                                         for (int k = 0; k < Count; k++) {
00262                                                 m_BitmapData[Index + k].Red = m_ColorTable[ColorIndex].Red;
00263                                                 m_BitmapData[Index + k].Green = m_ColorTable[ColorIndex].Green;
00264                                                 m_BitmapData[Index + k].Blue = m_ColorTable[ColorIndex].Blue;
00265                                                 m_BitmapData[Index + k].Alpha = m_ColorTable[ColorIndex].Alpha;
00266                                         }
00267                                         x += Count;
00268                                 } else if (Count == 0) {
00269                                         int Flag = ColorIndex;
00270                                         if (Flag == 0) {
00271                                                 x = 0;
00272                                                 y++;
00273                                         } else if (Flag == 1) {
00274                                                 break;
00275                                         } else if (Flag == 2) {
00276                                                 char rx = 0;
00277                                                 char ry = 0;
00278                                                 fread(&rx, 1, 1, file);
00279                                                 fread(&ry, 1, 1, file);
00280                                                 x += rx;
00281                                                 y += ry;
00282                                         } else {
00283                                                 Count = Flag;
00284                                                 Index = x + y * GetWidth();
00285                                                 for (int k = 0; k < Count; k++) {
00286                                                         fread(&ColorIndex, 1, 1, file);
00287                                                         m_BitmapData[Index + k].Red = m_ColorTable[ColorIndex].Red;
00288                                                         m_BitmapData[Index + k].Green = m_ColorTable[ColorIndex].Green;
00289                                                         m_BitmapData[Index + k].Blue = m_ColorTable[ColorIndex].Blue;
00290                                                         m_BitmapData[Index + k].Alpha = m_ColorTable[ColorIndex].Alpha;
00291                                                 }
00292                                                 x += Count;
00293                                                 if (ftell(file) & 1) fseek(file, 1, SEEK_CUR);
00294                                         }
00295                                 }
00296                         }
00297                 } else if (m_BitmapHeader.Compression == 2) { // RLE 4
00298                         /* RLE 4 is not supported */
00299                 } else if (m_BitmapHeader.Compression == 3) { // BITFIELDS
00300 
00301                         /* We assumes that mask of each color component can be in any order */
00302 
00303                         unsigned int BitCountRed = CColor::BitCountByMask(m_BitmapHeader.RedMask);
00304                         unsigned int BitCountGreen = CColor::BitCountByMask(m_BitmapHeader.GreenMask);
00305                         unsigned int BitCountBlue = CColor::BitCountByMask(m_BitmapHeader.BlueMask);
00306                         unsigned int BitCountAlpha = CColor::BitCountByMask(m_BitmapHeader.AlphaMask);
00307 
00308                         for (int i = 0; i < GetHeight(); i++) {
00309                                 fread(Line, LineWidth, 1, file);
00310 
00311                                 unsigned char *LinePtr = Line;
00312 
00313                                 for (int j = 0; j < GetWidth(); j++) {
00314 
00315                                         unsigned int Color = 0;
00316 
00317                                         if (m_BitmapHeader.BitCount == 16) {
00318                                                 Color = *((unsigned short int*) LinePtr);
00319                                                 LinePtr += 2;
00320                                         } else if (m_BitmapHeader.BitCount == 32) {
00321                                                 Color = *((unsigned int*) LinePtr);
00322                                                 LinePtr += 4;
00323                                         } else {
00324                                                 // Other formats are not valid
00325                                         }
00326                                         m_BitmapData[Index].Red = CColor::Convert(CColor::ComponentByMask(Color, m_BitmapHeader.RedMask), BitCountRed, 8);
00327                                         m_BitmapData[Index].Green = CColor::Convert(CColor::ComponentByMask(Color, m_BitmapHeader.GreenMask), BitCountGreen, 8);
00328                                         m_BitmapData[Index].Blue = CColor::Convert(CColor::ComponentByMask(Color, m_BitmapHeader.BlueMask), BitCountBlue, 8);
00329                                         m_BitmapData[Index].Alpha = CColor::Convert(CColor::ComponentByMask(Color, m_BitmapHeader.AlphaMask), BitCountAlpha, 8);
00330 
00331                                         Index++;
00332                                 }
00333                         }
00334                 }
00335 
00336                 fclose(file);
00337                 return true;
00338         }
00339 
00340         bool Save(char* Filename, unsigned int BitCount = 32) {
00341                 bool Result = false;
00342 
00343                 FILE *file = fopen(Filename, "wb");
00344 
00345                 if (file == 0) return false;
00346 
00347                 BITMAP_FILEHEADER bfh = {0};
00348                 BITMAP_HEADER bh = {0};
00349 
00350                 bfh.Signature = BITMAP_SIGNATURE;
00351                 bfh.BitsOffset = sizeof(BITMAP_HEADER) + sizeof(BITMAP_FILEHEADER);
00352                 bfh.Size = (GetWidth() * GetHeight() * BitCount) / 8 + bfh.BitsOffset;
00353 
00354                 bh.HeaderSize = sizeof(BITMAP_HEADER);
00355                 bh.BitCount = BitCount;
00356 
00357                 if (BitCount == 32) {
00358                         bh.Compression = 3; // BITFIELD
00359                         bh.AlphaMask = 0xff000000;
00360                         bh.BlueMask = 0x00ff0000;
00361                         bh.GreenMask = 0x0000ff00;
00362                         bh.RedMask = 0x000000ff;
00363                 } else if (BitCount == 16) {
00364                         bh.Compression = 3; // BITFIELD
00365                         bh.AlphaMask = 0x00000000;
00366                         bh.BlueMask = 0x0000001f;
00367                         bh.GreenMask = 0x000007E0;
00368                         bh.RedMask = 0x0000F800;
00369                 } else {
00370                         bh.Compression = 0; // RGB
00371                 }
00372 
00373                 unsigned int LineWidth = (GetWidth() + 3) & ~3;
00374 
00375                 bh.Planes = 1;
00376                 bh.Height = GetHeight();
00377                 bh.Width = GetWidth();
00378                 bh.SizeImage = (LineWidth * BitCount * GetHeight()) / 8;
00379                 bh.PelsPerMeterX = 3780;
00380                 bh.PelsPerMeterY = 3780;
00381 
00382                 if (BitCount == 32) {
00383                         fwrite(&bfh, sizeof(BITMAP_FILEHEADER), 1, file);
00384                         fwrite(&bh, sizeof(BITMAP_HEADER), 1, file);
00385                         fwrite(m_BitmapData, bh.SizeImage, 1, file);
00386                 } else if (BitCount < 16) {
00387                         unsigned char* Bitmap = new unsigned char[bh.SizeImage];
00388 
00389                         BGRA *Palette = 0;
00390                         unsigned int PaletteSize = 0;
00391 
00392                         if (GetBitsWithPalette(Bitmap, bh.SizeImage, BitCount, Palette, PaletteSize)) {
00393                                 bfh.BitsOffset += PaletteSize * sizeof(BGRA);
00394 
00395                                 fwrite(&bfh, sizeof(BITMAP_FILEHEADER), 1, file);
00396                                 fwrite(&bh, sizeof(BITMAP_HEADER), 1, file);
00397                                 fwrite(Palette, PaletteSize, sizeof(BGRA), file);
00398                                 fwrite(Bitmap, bh.SizeImage, 1, file);
00399                         }
00400                         delete [] Bitmap;
00401                         delete [] Palette;
00402                 } else {
00403                         unsigned int RedMask = 0;
00404                         unsigned int GreenMask = 0;
00405                         unsigned int BlueMask = 0;
00406                         unsigned int AlphaMask = 0;
00407 
00408                         if (BitCount == 16) {
00409                                 RedMask = 0x0000F800;
00410                                 GreenMask = 0x000007E0;
00411                                 BlueMask = 0x0000001F;
00412                                 AlphaMask = 0x00000000;
00413                         } else if (BitCount == 24) {
00414                                 RedMask = 0x00FF0000;
00415                                 GreenMask = 0x0000FF00;
00416                                 BlueMask = 0x000000FF;
00417                         } else {
00418                                 // Other color formats are not valid
00419                                 return false;
00420                         }
00421 
00422                         if (GetBits(NULL, bh.SizeImage, RedMask, GreenMask, BlueMask, AlphaMask)) {
00423                                 unsigned char* Bitmap = new unsigned char[bh.SizeImage];
00424                                 if (GetBits(Bitmap, bh.SizeImage, RedMask, GreenMask, BlueMask, AlphaMask)) {
00425                                         fwrite(&bfh, sizeof(BITMAP_FILEHEADER), 1, file);
00426                                         fwrite(&bh, sizeof(BITMAP_HEADER), 1, file);
00427                                         fwrite(Bitmap, bh.SizeImage, 1, file);
00428                                 }
00429                                 delete [] Bitmap;
00430                         }
00431                 }
00432                 Result = true;
00433 
00434                 fclose(file);
00435                 return Result;
00436         }
00437 
00438         unsigned int GetWidth() {
00439                 return m_BitmapHeader.Width < 0 ? -m_BitmapHeader.Width : m_BitmapHeader.Width;
00440         }
00441 
00442         unsigned int GetHeight() {
00443                 return m_BitmapHeader.Height < 0 ? -m_BitmapHeader.Height : m_BitmapHeader.Height;
00444         }
00445 
00446         unsigned int GetBitCount() {
00447                 return m_BitmapHeader.BitCount;
00448         }
00449 
00450         /* Copies internal RGBA buffer to user specified buffer */
00451 
00452         bool GetBits(void* Buffer, unsigned int &Size) {
00453                 bool Result = false;
00454                 if (Size == 0 || Buffer == 0) {
00455                         Size = m_BitmapSize * sizeof(RGBA);
00456                         Result = m_BitmapSize != 0;
00457                 } else {
00458                         memcpy(Buffer, m_BitmapData, Size);
00459                         Result = true;
00460                 }
00461                 return Result;
00462         }
00463 
00464         /* Returns internal RGBA buffer */
00465 
00466         void* GetBits() {
00467                 return m_BitmapData;
00468         }
00469 
00470         /* Copies internal RGBA buffer to user specified buffer and converts it into destination
00471          * bit format specified by component masks.
00472          *
00473          * Typical Bitmap color formats (BGR/BGRA):
00474          *
00475          * Masks for 16 bit (5-5-5): ALPHA = 0x00000000, RED = 0x00007C00, GREEN = 0x000003E0, BLUE = 0x0000001F
00476          * Masks for 16 bit (5-6-5): ALPHA = 0x00000000, RED = 0x0000F800, GREEN = 0x000007E0, BLUE = 0x0000001F
00477          * Masks for 24 bit: ALPHA = 0x00000000, RED = 0x00FF0000, GREEN = 0x0000FF00, BLUE = 0x000000FF
00478          * Masks for 32 bit: ALPHA = 0xFF000000, RED = 0x00FF0000, GREEN = 0x0000FF00, BLUE = 0x000000FF
00479          *
00480          * Other color formats (RGB/RGBA):
00481          *
00482          * Masks for 32 bit (RGBA): ALPHA = 0xFF000000, RED = 0x000000FF, GREEN = 0x0000FF00, BLUE = 0x00FF0000
00483          *
00484          * Bit count will be rounded to next 8 bit boundary. If IncludePadding is true, it will be ensured
00485          * that line width is a multiple of 4. padding bytes are included if necessary.
00486          *
00487          * NOTE: systems with big endian byte order may require masks in inversion order.
00488          */
00489 
00490         bool GetBits(void* Buffer, unsigned int &Size, unsigned int RedMask, unsigned int GreenMask, unsigned int BlueMask, unsigned int AlphaMask, bool IncludePadding = true) {
00491                 bool Result = false;
00492 
00493                 unsigned int BitCountRed = CColor::BitCountByMask(RedMask);
00494                 unsigned int BitCountGreen = CColor::BitCountByMask(GreenMask);
00495                 unsigned int BitCountBlue = CColor::BitCountByMask(BlueMask);
00496                 unsigned int BitCountAlpha = CColor::BitCountByMask(AlphaMask);
00497 
00498                 unsigned int BitCount = (BitCountRed + BitCountGreen + BitCountBlue + BitCountAlpha + 7) & ~7;
00499 
00500                 if (BitCount > 32) {
00501                         return false;
00502                 }
00503 
00504                 unsigned int w = GetWidth();
00505                 unsigned int LineWidth = (w + 3) & ~3;
00506 
00507                 if (Size == 0 || Buffer == 0) {
00508                         Size = (LineWidth * GetHeight() * BitCount) / 8 + sizeof(unsigned int);
00509                         return true;
00510                 }
00511 
00512                 unsigned char* BufferPtr = (unsigned char*) Buffer;
00513 
00514                 Result = true;
00515 
00516                 unsigned int BitPosRed = CColor::BitPositionByMask(RedMask);
00517                 unsigned int BitPosGreen = CColor::BitPositionByMask(GreenMask);
00518                 unsigned int BitPosBlue = CColor::BitPositionByMask(BlueMask);
00519                 unsigned int BitPosAlpha = CColor::BitPositionByMask(AlphaMask);
00520 
00521                 int j = 0;
00522 
00523                 for (int i = 0; i < m_BitmapSize; i++) {
00524                         *(unsigned int*) BufferPtr =
00525                         (CColor::Convert(m_BitmapData[i].Blue, 8, BitCountBlue) << BitPosBlue) |
00526                         (CColor::Convert(m_BitmapData[i].Green, 8, BitCountGreen) << BitPosGreen) |
00527                         (CColor::Convert(m_BitmapData[i].Red, 8, BitCountRed) << BitPosRed) |
00528                         (CColor::Convert(m_BitmapData[i].Green, 8, BitCountAlpha) << BitPosAlpha);
00529 
00530                         if (IncludePadding) {
00531                                 j++;
00532                                 if (j >= w) {
00533                                         for (unsigned int k = 0; k < LineWidth - w; k++) {
00534                                                 BufferPtr += (BitCount >> 3);
00535                                         }
00536                                         j = 0;
00537                                 }
00538                         }
00539 
00540                         BufferPtr += (BitCount >> 3);
00541                 }
00542 
00543                 Size -= sizeof(unsigned int);
00544 
00545                 return Result;
00546         }
00547 
00548         /* See GetBits().
00549          * It creates a corresponding color table (palette) which have to be destroyed by the user after usage.
00550          *
00551          * Supported Bit depths are: 4, 8
00552          *
00553          * Todo: Optimize, use optimized palette, do ditehring (see my dithering class), support padding for 4 bit bitmaps
00554          */
00555 
00556         bool GetBitsWithPalette(void* Buffer, unsigned int &Size, unsigned int BitCount, BGRA* &Palette, unsigned int &PaletteSize, bool OptimalPalette = false, bool IncludePadding = true) {
00557                 bool Result = false;
00558 
00559                 if (BitCount > 16) {
00560                         return false;
00561                 }
00562 
00563                 unsigned int w = GetWidth();
00564                 unsigned int LineWidth = (w + 3) & ~3;
00565 
00566                 if (Size == 0 || Buffer == 0) {
00567                         Size = (LineWidth * GetHeight() * BitCount) / 8;
00568                         return true;
00569                 }
00570 
00571 
00572                 if (OptimalPalette) {
00573                         PaletteSize = 0;
00574                         // Not implemented
00575                 } else {
00576                         if (BitCount == 1) {
00577                                 PaletteSize = 2;
00578                                 // Not implemented: Who need that?
00579                         } else if (BitCount == 4) { // 2:2:1
00580                                 PaletteSize = 16;
00581                                 Palette = new BGRA[PaletteSize];
00582                                 for (int r = 0; r < 4; r++) {
00583                                         for (int g = 0; g < 2; g++) {
00584                                                 for (int b = 0; b < 2; b++) {
00585                                                         Palette[r | g << 2 | b << 3].Red = r ? (r << 6) | 0x3f : 0;
00586                                                         Palette[r | g << 2 | b << 3].Green = g ? (g << 7) | 0x7f : 0;
00587                                                         Palette[r | g << 2 | b << 3].Blue = b ? (b << 7) | 0x7f : 0;
00588                                                         Palette[r | g << 2 | b << 3].Alpha = 0xff;
00589                                                 }
00590                                         }
00591                                 }
00592                         } else if (BitCount == 8) { // 3:3:2
00593                                 PaletteSize = 256;
00594                                 Palette = new BGRA[PaletteSize];
00595                                 for (int r = 0; r < 8; r++) {
00596                                         for (int g = 0; g < 8; g++) {
00597                                                 for (int b = 0; b < 4; b++) {
00598                                                         Palette[r | g << 3 | b << 6].Red = r ? (r << 5) | 0x1f : 0;
00599                                                         Palette[r | g << 3 | b << 6].Green = g ? (g << 5) | 0x1f : 0;
00600                                                         Palette[r | g << 3 | b << 6].Blue = b ? (b << 6) | 0x3f : 0;
00601                                                         Palette[r | g << 3 | b << 6].Alpha = 0xff;
00602                                                 }
00603                                         }
00604                                 }
00605                         } else if (BitCount == 16) { // 5:5:5
00606                                 // Not implemented
00607                         }
00608                 }
00609 
00610                 unsigned int j = 0;
00611                 unsigned char* BufferPtr = (unsigned char*) Buffer;
00612 
00613                 for (unsigned int i = 0; i < m_BitmapSize; i++) {
00614                         if (BitCount == 1) {
00615                                 // Not implemented: Who needs that?
00616                         } else if (BitCount == 4) {
00617                                 *BufferPtr = ((m_BitmapData[i].Red >> 6) | (m_BitmapData[i].Green >> 7) << 2 | (m_BitmapData[i].Blue >> 7) << 3) << 4;
00618                                 i++;
00619                                 *BufferPtr |= (m_BitmapData[i].Red >> 6) | (m_BitmapData[i].Green >> 7) << 2 | (m_BitmapData[i].Blue >> 7) << 3;
00620                         } else if (BitCount == 8) {
00621                                 *BufferPtr = (m_BitmapData[i].Red >> 5) | (m_BitmapData[i].Green >> 5) << 3 | (m_BitmapData[i].Blue >> 5) << 6;
00622                         } else if (BitCount == 16) {
00623                                 // Not implemented
00624                         }
00625 
00626                         if (IncludePadding) {
00627                                 j++;
00628                                 if (j >= w) {
00629                                         for (unsigned int k = 0; k < (LineWidth - w); k++) {
00630                                                 BufferPtr += BitCount / 8;
00631                                         }
00632                                         j = 0;
00633                                 }
00634                         }
00635 
00636                         BufferPtr++;
00637                 }
00638 
00639                 Result = true;
00640 
00641                 return Result;
00642         }
00643 
00644         /* Set Bitmap Bits. Will be converted to RGBA internally */
00645 
00646         void SetBits(void* Buffer, unsigned int Width, unsigned int Height, unsigned int RedMask, unsigned int GreenMask, unsigned int BlueMask, unsigned int AlphaMask = 0) {
00647                 unsigned char *BufferPtr = (unsigned char*) Buffer;
00648 
00649                 Dispose();
00650 
00651                 m_BitmapHeader.Width = Width;
00652                 m_BitmapHeader.Height = Height;
00653                 m_BitmapHeader.BitCount = 32;
00654                 m_BitmapHeader.Compression = 3;
00655 
00656                 m_BitmapSize = GetWidth() * GetHeight();
00657                 m_BitmapData = new RGBA[m_BitmapSize];
00658 
00659                 /* Find bit count by masks (rounded to next 8 bit boundary) */
00660 
00661                 unsigned int BitCount = (CColor::BitCountByMask(RedMask | GreenMask | BlueMask | AlphaMask) + 7) & ~7;
00662 
00663                 unsigned int BitCountRed = CColor::BitCountByMask(RedMask);
00664                 unsigned int BitCountGreen = CColor::BitCountByMask(GreenMask);
00665                 unsigned int BitCountBlue = CColor::BitCountByMask(BlueMask);
00666                 unsigned int BitCountAlpha = CColor::BitCountByMask(AlphaMask);
00667 
00668                 for (unsigned int i = 0; i < m_BitmapSize; i++) {
00669                         unsigned int Color = 0;
00670                         if (BitCount <= 8) {
00671                                 Color = *((unsigned char*) BufferPtr);
00672                                 BufferPtr += 1;
00673                         } else if (BitCount <= 16) {
00674                                 Color = *((unsigned short int*) BufferPtr);
00675                                 BufferPtr += 2;
00676                         } else if (BitCount <= 24) {
00677                                 Color = *((unsigned int*) BufferPtr);
00678                                 BufferPtr += 3;
00679                         } else if (BitCount <= 32) {
00680                                 Color = *((unsigned int*) BufferPtr);
00681                                 BufferPtr += 4;
00682                         } else {
00683                                 /* unsupported */
00684                                 BufferPtr += 1;
00685                         }
00686                         m_BitmapData[i].Alpha = CColor::Convert(CColor::ComponentByMask(Color, AlphaMask), BitCountAlpha, 8);
00687                         m_BitmapData[i].Red = CColor::Convert(CColor::ComponentByMask(Color, RedMask), BitCountRed, 8);
00688                         m_BitmapData[i].Green = CColor::Convert(CColor::ComponentByMask(Color, GreenMask), BitCountGreen, 8);
00689                         m_BitmapData[i].Blue = CColor::Convert(CColor::ComponentByMask(Color, BlueMask), BitCountBlue, 8);
00690                 }
00691         }
00692 };
